AL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
155 
 
 
 
Did you know? 
 
• Shock index = Heart rate / Systolic blood pressure. 
• Conditions with risk of early coagulopathy includes:  Massive blood loss from any cause;  Abruption placenta; 
Amniotic fluid embolism; IUD with retained products > 2 weeks; Sepsis; Pre-eclampsia; HELLP syndrome; Fatty 
liver of pregnancy. 
• Hypothermia contribute to excessive bleeding, coagulopathy and worse patient outcomes.
